body_html: @adelsalehali1982 Your error is unrelated to this issue, and happens because the code you are running supposes that 4 GPUs are used (if gpus are enabled), and you probabmy have less than 4 GPUs in your machine. You can fix that by changing the line with DataParallel to only use 1 or 2 GPUs

body: @adelsalehali1982 Your error is unrelated to this issue, and happens because the code you are running supposes that 4 GPUs are used (if gpus are enabled), and you probabmy have less than 4 GPUs in your machine. You can fix that by changing the line with DataParallel to only use 1 or 2 GPUs
